Package com.agsimeonov.flogger.backend.fluentd

Core package for the Flogger Fluentd Backend.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FluentdLevelDisabler
    Implementing classes are used to determine wheter given levels are loggable.
    FluentdRemoteSettings
    Used to configure remote Fluentd loggers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FluentdBackendFactory
    BackendFactory for Fluentd.
    FluentdCallerFinder
    The base for Fluentd caller finders which makes sure to set the log site based on the stack.
    FluentdTagsKeyValueHandler
    Key Value handler employed when logging out Tags to Fluentd.
    ImplementationTitleCallerFinder
    Caller finder utilizing the implementation title as the tax prefix.
    SystemPropertiesCallerFinder
    Caller finder utilizing system properties for the tax prefix.
    SystemPropertiesLevelDisabler
    Determines whether logging is disabled at specific levels based on system properties.
    SystemPropertiesRemoteSettings
    Configures remote fluentd loggers via system proprties.

Package com.agsimeonov.flogger.backend.fluentd Description

Core package for the Flogger Fluentd Backend.
